strIntroduction: The island of the sea turtle with its long beaches, idyllic bays, its magnificent blooming Flora and romantic grottos counts as the loveliest island in the Ionian sea. With pine trees, cypress, vineyards and the Italian architecture, this island reminds of Tuscany.

Choose our basic wedding package, including all that you need on your special day. The day begins seamlessly. Once all the necessary preparations are made at the hotel, you are picked up and transferred to the striking Castle Panigirakis, a landmark location overlooking the incredible Aegean Sea and Mykonos Town, which the energy of the island of Delos ahead of the horizon.

Experience a fascinating and poignant day as you sail to the beautiful island of Spinalonga, often called the “island of tears” due to its past as a leper colony. For over fifty years it was home to hundreds of lepers who were forbidden to leave yet attempted to live normal lives. Explore the shops, hospital and graveyard before sailing to Kolokitha Island to moor at an idyllic beach. Relax, swim or snorkel whilst the crew prepares a delicious barbecue lunch and drinks.
strTitle: Sailing excursion to Spinalonga and Kolokitha Islands

strIntroduction: Take a guided morning hike in Meteora to see the best views of the area's 6 Eastern Orthodox monasteries made of sandstone rock. On this 5-hour tour, enjoy fresh air and marvel at the jaw-dropping panoramic views from this UNESCO World Heritage Site.
strTitle: From Kalampaka: 5-Hour Hiking Tour of Meteora

strIntroduction: The island of Mykonos boasts of local people that are very proud of its traditions and that could keep its culture alive through many centuries of lively history. How did the Myconians live and which traditions are being kept until today? Our excursion deals with these subjects.

Take a half-day tour of Cape Sounion and the Temple of Poseidon. Pass idyllic beaches as you leave Athens for some of the most gorgeous ruins of Ancient Greece. Your fun guide will fill you in on the history of Greece as you look out over Poseidon's sea!
strTitle: Temple of Poseidon and Cape Sounion Tour: From Athens
Athens Night Sightseeing Tour with Greek Dinner Show

strIntroduction: Half day trip to both picturesque town Oia and Fira

Enjoy the crystal-clear waters of the Aegean Sea and sail with us along the south coast of Greece in a traditional Greek ship. This tour features stops at many beautiful Greek beaches, opportunities to go snorkeling, and a traditional Greek lunch.

strTitle: Hydra, Poros and Egina Day Cruise from Athens

strIntroduction: The amazing crystal visibility of the Mediterranean waters will allow divers to see sponges, corals, lumper eels, blackfish, sea beams, scorpion fish, multi-coloured stripey fish, amphorae shards, caves and shipwrecks.
Lotus Spa is a spacious and brand new spa center in Santorini where you can spend endless hours of leisure and rejuvenation.
Ride with wind, experience freedom.

Enjoy a natural pedicure as you dip your feet into calming water at this Athens spa. Let the exotic little Garra Rufa fish nibble away at the dry skin, leaving your feet feeling relaxed and rejuvenated.
高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。

This is a real once in a lifetime experience. Getting married at one of the most beautiful places on earth under the spirit of the sacred Santorini as the sun falls slept in one of the most amazing sunsets in the world. You don't have to worry about anything; all arrangements are done from us. All you have to consider is to be fresh, happy and enjoy this incredible day of your life.

strTitle: Mycenae and Epidaurus Day Trip from Athens

strIntroduction: Discover the picturesque mountain village of Myrtia on this half-day tour on Crete. Explore the birthplace of the famous writer Nikos Kazantsakis, visit the wine plantation of the well-known Minos wine, and sample various fine wines.
strTitle: Crete: Half-Day Tour through the Vineyards of Myrtia

strIntroduction: Relax, breathe and flow into the island’s sacred and revitalizing energy. Sunset Vinyasa will give the yoga lover an opportunity to experience their practice from the most unique vantage point Mykonos has to offer.
Sail north from Rhodes to discover the stunningly beautiful island of Symi with its impossibly blue waters and delightful Venetian architecture.
Ancient Thera, the city with its nowadays fascinating ruins, was built at a picturesque settlement at the top of a high rocky mountain called ‘’Mesa Vouno’’.

Learn the secrets of Greek cuisine on this 3-hour cooking lesson and dinner experience. Visit one of the oldest and most popular “tavernas” in Athens to learn cooking secrets from your instructor, with easy instructions and plenty of hands-on cooking!0

At one of the most beautiful beaches in Mykonos the wind made us a present. All summer long from May to October the Meltemi blows loyal and faithful with up to 6Bft inside Kalaftis Bay. In the heart of this windy place the Windsurfing Center Mykonos welcomes you. This is the place for everyone who wants to live for their addiction to windsurf.

Join us for a mysterious trip, on a dark winter night. Any time from the onset of autumn darkness until the light nights of spring, we can witness one of nature’s most spectacular displays; the phenomenon which we call the Northern Lights.
strTitle: Northern Lights Night Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Journey across striking landscapes on Snæfellsnes peninsula and experience stunning natural beauty and breathtaking imagery.

橫跨冰島南部的冰山健行之旅，
截然不同的冰島體驗選擇，
穿越農田與瀑布，拜訪最原始的壯麗景致！
擁有冰島最不一樣的深度體驗！
strTitle: 【一生必去】冰島人間仙境：南海岸瀑布冰川健行

strIntroduction: Plunge yourself into the world of the adorable puffin, the most colourful, charismatic and entertaining little seabird north of the equator and star of this boat trip off the Icelandic coast.

Available throughout the year, this speleology tour takes you to unique locations in Iceland’s most spectacular lava tube caves and craters. These beautiful, natural phenomena were created when the surface lava solidified but magma continued to flow in tunnels.
strTitle: Volcanic Veins - Caving in Lava Tube Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Get ready for an Icelandic off-road adventure with this quad bike tour of the twin peaks of Hafrafell and Úlfarsfell mountains. Venture off the beaten path in an ATV to get an up-close perspective of natural attractions like Lake Hafravatn during the 3.5-hour tour. Admire stunning vistas of Reykjavik, the Blue Mountain range and Hellisheiði Power Station from the summits, and feel the thrill of cruising across the rugged wintry wonderland and up and down steep mountain tracks.
strTitle: Twin Peak Quad Bike Adventure from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Find the ultimate relaxation when in Reykjavik on this excursion to the Blue Lagoon. Surrounded by lava fields and snow-capped mountains, the Blue Lagoon is a geothermal spa outside the city where you can bathe in the warm waters, have a water massage or enjoy a spa treatment. With your transportation all arranged, just lie back and relax, before catching your transport back to your hotel in Reykjavik or to Keflavik Airport for your flight home.
strTitle: Blue Lagoon Spa Roundtrip Transport from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Hike and climb Iceland's Sólheimajökull, one of the most beautiful glaciers in the world. Along with an expert guide, you can explore the deep crevasses and even climb its glassy ice walls with provided safety equipment.
strTitle: Day Trip from Reykjavik: Glacier Hiking and Ice Climbing on Iceland's Sólheimajokull Glacier

strIntroduction: This tour takes you to unique sights of Iceland's most spectacular lava tube caves and craters.

Take a scenic route of Iceland's South Coast to experience the amazing geological beauty of the country on a full-day tour. See famous volcanoes, waterfalls, glaciers and black sand beaches. Travel in a small group for more personalized service.
strTitle: Iceland's South Coast & Volcanoes Day Tour

strIntroduction: All aboard for an invigorating sea angling tour! Apart from introducing you to the world-famous fishing grounds off the coast of Iceland, this excursion will also enable you to feast on your own freshly-caught fish at the end of the day.

Be on the lookout for whales during this 3-hour cruise on Faxafloi Bay in Reykjavik. Cruise along Iceland's west coast to encounter humpback, minke whales, and white-beaked dolphins. Afterward, learn more about whales at the Whale Exhibition Center.
Enjoy awe-inspiring aerial views of Reykjavik and its mountains on this 40-minute shared Iceland helicopter tour.
strTitle: Reykjavik Helicopter Tour: Mt Esja Summit

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。

Take a trip to the edge of Iceland on a full-day tour from Reykjavik. Travel to Látrabjarg, the westernmost part of Iceland and all of Europe, passing through stunning scenery. At Látrabjarg you will explore the area that is home to many species of birds.

Admire nature’s own spectacular light show on a 2-hour cruise from Reykjavik Harbour, sailing out towards the unknown in search of the Northern Lights. See their brilliant colors flashing across the evening sky, with views of Reykjavík in the background.
strTitle: Northern Lights Viewing Cruise from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: We start with the black as we explore the hidden world of the lava field under the Þingvellir national park. Walking in a cave and discovering the marvels that volcanic activity has created in the past is a trip that everyone can undertake.

This tour is for those that don t have too much time but still want to make the most their stay. The tour takes you to the Blue Lagoon before exploring the Golden Circle: Þingvellir national park, Geysir and Gullfoss waterfall.
strTitle: The Blue Lagoon and Gullfoss with Geysir

strIntroduction: Experience Iceland's unique volcanic landscapes on this bus tour from Reykjavik. You'll explore the Landmannalauger geothermal area and volcanic mountains, bathe in a geothermal pool, and visit Hekla, one of Iceland's famous volcanoes.

Experience a handful of Iceland’s most popular attractions in a single day with this Super Saver from Reykjavik. Soak in the milky, mineral-rich waters of the Blue Lagoon and treat your skin to a silica mud mask in the midst of a steamy landscape. Once you’re fully relaxed, tour Iceland’s rugged geothermal fields to see the natural hot springs and spouting geysers of Geysir and Strokkur. Marvel at the thundering Gullfoss waterfall and take a scenic drive through the UNESCO-listed Thingvellir National Park.
strTitle: The Blue Langoon and Gullfoss with Geysir - with standard entrance

strIntroduction: Prepare yourself for the adventure of a lifetime on our tour of Iceland’s spectacular south coast, which includes an exhilarating hike through Porsmork (otherwise known as Thor’s Woodland). This inspiring tour will introduce you to an area of unparalleled beauty as you come face to face with Iceland’s distinctive natural wonders.

If you are a certified diver, with or without a dry suit experience, this tour is something for you. It gives you the opportunity to dive in one of the world’s top ten diving sites Silfra, situated in the Þingvellir National Park.

Explore the geothermal areas and glacial landscapes of Iceland on a 6-hour bus tour of Gullfoss, Geysir, and Thingvellir National Park. Go to the site of the open-air assembly that ran from 930 to 1798, and see evidence of how the land was cultivated.
strTitle: Gulfoss and Geysir Express Half-Day Trip from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: This combination of a Viking Horse Riding Tour and AH11 Golden Circle Afternoon is for those who don't have much time, but want to make the most of their day.
strTitle: The Viking Horse Riding tour and Gullfoss with Geysir in the afternoon

strIntroduction: Thrill at the sight of one of the most awe-inspiring phenomena of the oceans: majestic whales swimming and diving in their natural habitat.
The Reykjanes Peninsula tour offers extreme variety of landscapes dotted with fissures, lava fields and geothermal activity.
Journey through Iceland's underground caves and craters on this unique day trip about an hour outside of Reykjavik.
This Golden Circle Super Jeep tour allows visitors to get in touch with some of Iceland’s most famous and exciting natural phenomena.

On this 60-minute tour of the Icelandic brewery Ölgerðin, you will learn about the quirkiness of Icelandic drinking culture while indulging in several drinks yourself. Discover the history of Iceland's brewing tradition through stories across the ages.

Enjoy Skaftafell National Park at your own leisure.This one way transfer from Reykjavík takes you to Skaftafell National Park. We leave Reykjavík at 7:30am and arrive in the National Park in Skaftafell at around noon.
This tour is ideal as a relaxing end to a busy day or as a beginning of a fun night in town.
strTitle: Whale watching in the Midnight Sun - with transfer

strIntroduction: Whale Safari is Reykavik’s only small group’s whale watching tour operator. Our specially made RIB boats are made to get close to the whales, dolphins and puffins of the Faxaflói Bay.
strTitle: Whale and Puffin Watching by Rib Boats
Malta Sightseeing Tour: Blue Grotto, Marsaxlokk and Ghar Dalam
Gozo Day Trip from Malta Including Ggantija Temples

strIntroduction: Enjoy a full-day excursion to Gozo from Malta. Discover the island's splendid highlights, such as the Azure Window, the Citadel of Rabat, the ancient Ggantija Temples, and even a bit of legend: Odysseus is said to have been stranded there for 7 years.
strTitle: Full-Day Gozo Island Excursion from Malta
Valletta Walking Tour Including Grandmaster’s Palace

strIntroduction: Take a full-day tour of central Malta and discover its history and culture. Visit the Mosta Church, stroll through San Antons Gardens, watch artisans and glass blowers at work in Ta' Qali. See St. Paul's Grotto, tour Mdina, enjoy lunch, and much more.
strTitle: Central Malta Full-Day Tour with Lunch
Small-Group Tour: French Riviera in One Day from Monaco

strIntroduction: Explore the glamour of the French Riviera on a half-day tour of Monaco and its surrounding villages. With convenient departures from Cannes, Nice, and Monaco, you will also head for the hillside village of Eze and drive along the “Terrace of Monaco.”
strTitle: Monaco, Monte Carlo and Eze Half-Day Trip

strIntroduction: Create a unique souvenir of your time in Monaco on a private 1 or 2-hour photo shoot at the French Riviera location(s) of your choice. Take home personalized photos of you in front of the city’s most stunning backdrops, and choose from a range of options.
strTitle: Monaco: Private Professional and Luxury Photo Shoot

strIntroduction: Explore the French Riviera and see beautiful beaches and celebrity homes on this luxurious 3-hour boat cruise. Glide by Cap Martin and its beaches, Beaulieu, Bay of Eze, St. Jean Cap Ferrat and the beautiful Fossette Creek.

On the French Riviera, the driving force of your life spent on the steering wheel of a Ferrari F430 F1 Spider. Izmir scenic cruising along the lane, and Monte Carlo overlooking a stunning panorama road.

strTitle: French Riviera Scenic Helicopter Tour from Monaco

strIntroduction: Enjoy visiting the most glamorous country in the world, Monaco, and Monte Carlo's royal palace. Admire panoramic views over Nice as you drive by the Middle Corniche road. Stop at Eze, a perched medieval village with artisan shops and breathtaking views.
strTitle: From Villefranche: Private Half-Day Monaco Shore Excursion

Enjoy a dog sledding trip into white landscapes, through beautiful wilderness. After your trip you can relax with a hot meal served in the traditional Sami herdsmen’s tent- lavvu!

Save time and money during your Oslo visit with Oslo Pass. With a choice between a 24, 48 or 72 hour card, Oslo Pass offers free admission to a selection of over 30 attractions, museums, and tours for one low pre-paid price.
Try an exciting dog sledding trip into a beautiful winter landscape!
Use this Sim Card among 11 European countries with high-speed networks and unlimited data!

Climb aboard a wooden sailing ship for a 3-hour cruise of the Oslo fjords. Pass a maze of green islands, and sit back to enjoy the cinematic scenery. Savor the fresh flavor of fjord shrimps at a dinner buffet, with hot and cold drinks from the bar.
Be Superman for a day and learn to fly in Scandinavia's first wind tunnel in Voss!
This Segway tour will show you the beautiful city of Bergen and you will get a once in a lifetime segway experience in the mountains.
Day trip rafting with lunch on the river Sjoa, the most famous river for rafting in Northern Europe. Sjoa offers quality rafting for both beginners and the experienced.
strTitle: Rafting Day Trip on the Sjoa River

strIntroduction: Looking for an alternative outdoor activity to skiing and hiking this winter? During a snowshoe hike you will be rewarded with stunning snowy landscapes and a winter fjord view.
Experience the magnificent Lysefjord, the Pulpit Rock (Preikestolen), wild and beautiful coastal scenery, the popular Norway in a nutshell trip.
strTitle: Pulpit Rock & Norway in a Nutshell

strIntroduction: On the Hardangerfjord in a nutshell round trip, you will experience a journey through a landscape of majestic mountains, roaring waterfalls and idyllic orchards.

Enjoy a dose of snow-filled fun on this 2.5-hour winter activity camp experience from Tromsø. With a local guide, travel outside the city to enjoy a variety of exciting winter pursuits. Ride toboggans down icy hillsides, plod through the woodland on snowshoes and try cross-country skiing or ice-skating. Relax by the campfire with a hot drink and cake as your guide shares stories about the surrounding Arctic landscape. No winter sports experience is necessary and activities are suitable for all the family.
strTitle: Tromso Winter Adventure: Snowshoeing, Tobogganing and Cross-Country Skiing

strIntroduction: Relax on this three-hour evening boat cruise around Oslo’s harbor and the northern end of the Oslofjord.

Spend an evening aboard a wooden sailboat in Oslo, and sail around the waters of Oslo Fjord. A great way to see the waterfront sights as the sun goes down, this 3-hour boat cruise follows a route past Akershus Fortress, Oslo Opera House and more. Cruise around the pretty islets of the fjord, and enjoy a snack of shrimps as you go.
strTitle: Norwegian Evening Cruise on the Fjord

strIntroduction: On this walking tour of Oslo you’ll be introduced to the unique flavors of the deep valleys and the remote fishing villages as you taste regional specialties. Visit out-of-the-way places, see historical sites, and taste locally made beers as well.
strTitle: Oslo Food and Beer: 4-Hour Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Cycle the flat city center streets of Oslo exploring all the major highlights. Bike in a leisurely fashion past the castle of Akershus Festning, City Hall, Royal Palace, Oslo Fjord, and much more.

Enjoy a four hour bike tour through an immense wilderness called the marka, full of wild berries, dozens of lakes, moose, and stunning views of Oslo and the fjord below.
strTitle: Oslo: Forest to Fjord Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Visit Frogner Park (commonly known as Vigeland Park), the Holmenkollen Ski Jump and three top Oslo museums on a half-day city tour of Oslo! Travel between each must-visit attraction by coach, and learn all about each site from an expert guide.
strTitle: All-Inclusive Oslo City Tour: Viking Ship Museum, Vigeland Park, Polarship Fram Museum and Kon-Tiki Museum

strIntroduction: The Sognefjord, Norway’s longest and deepest fjord, extends more than 200 km inland to the foot of the Jotunheimen mountains. This area is said to be one of the most beautiful travel destinations in the world.

strTitle: Moscow Shooting Experience: Shoot an AK-47 at the Central Shooting Club
